summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Engineering Department; providing for the widening of the existing roadway, construction and reconstruction of sidewalks and such other improvements as may be necessary in Northeast 45th Street from 5th Avenue Northeast to a point 100 feet west thereof, in Northeast 50th street from 7th Avenue Northeast to a point in the vicinity of 8th Avenue Northeast and from 5th Avenue Northeast to 4th Avenue Northeast and making appropriations from the City Street Fund and Arterial City Street Fund therefor.
